headline: Philips introduces 3D Printed Parts for Repair
description: Fixables is a collection of 3D printable spare parts for Philips products designed to help you replace small but essential external parts of your device.

headline: Bio-concrete from urine
description: Researchers at the University of Stuttgart have used microbial processes to produce environmentally friendly bio-concrete from urine as part of a 'wastewater-bio-concrete-fertilizer' value chain. With the project extension granted by the Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg Ministry of Science, Research, and the Arts, the focus now shifts to product optimization and practical testing.

headline: The breakthroughs making solar panels more efficient
description: Experts are working to improve the power conversion rate of solar technology. Innovations such as panels using perovskites are showing promising results. A World Economic Forum report also suggests quantum computing could help design more efficient panels.
